General.Name: Sino Wealth Electronic Ltd
General.Description: Sino Wealth Electronic Ltd. researches, designs, develops, produces, and sells integrated circuits in China and internationally. It offers industrial control level microcontroller chips and AMOLED display drive chips, as well as related electronic module products. It also imports, exports, and wholesales electronic products; and provides commission and trade agency, as well as related technical consulting services. The company's products are used in smart home appliances, lithium battery management, motor control, smart meters, consumer electronics, computer peripherals, and Internet of Things, as well screen display drivers of mobile phones. Sino Wealth Electronic Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Shanghai, China.
